title: 8 October 2015 - SARS uncovers scheme to defraud the tax system of R266 million ...
text: ( Source : SARS - South African Revenue Service ) Pretoria , 8 October 2015 - The South African Revenue Service (SARS) foiled an attempt by a group of individuals to defraud the fiscus of R266 230 423. The individuals, representing a registered
